channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: More give Trump an F than any other grade for first 100 days, poll finds
item.description: Nearly half of Americans give President Trump a failing grade for his presidency so far, with near record low approval ratings at this point in the jo...

item.title: Trump has used government powers to target more than 100 perceived enemies

item.title: Supreme Court weighs whether law enforcement can be held accountable for raid on wrong house
item.description: It's not easy to bring such cases. That's because the federal government is generally immune from being sued, except in certain circumstances set out ...

item.title: Despite improving relations, U.S. will be absent from Vietnam's war anniversary parade

item.title: Trump wants to bypass immigration courts. Experts warn it's a 'slippery slope.'

item.title: Canada's Liberal Party wins national election overshadowed by Trump
item.description: Canadian Prime Minster Mark Carney's Liberal Party will retain its hold on power, in a reversal of fortunes seen largely as a reaction to Mr. Trump's ...

item.title: Iran blames 'negligence' for port blast as death toll rises to 70
item.description: The interior minister said "some individuals deemed responsible" for Saturday's blast at Shahid Rajaee are being questioned.

item.title: Hope and fear as tourists trickle back to Kashmir town after attack
item.description: The escalation in tensions means it could be years before tourism and businesses thrive again in Kashmir.

item.title: Black female WWII unit, ‘Six Triple Eight,’ to receive congressional honor
Trump to mark first 100 days in office with speech in the Detroit area
item.description: President Trump is delivering a speech marking the first 100 days of his second term in Warren, Michigan.

item.title: Trump made Carney's turnaround victory possible
item.description: Mark Carney's party pull off an election win that once looked near-impossible, until the US president targeted Canada.

item.title: How African popes changed Christianity - and gave us Valentine's Day
item.description: Historians say there were three popes of North African descent, the last one more than 1,500 years ago.

item.title: Papal conclave to begin May 7. Here's how a new pope will be chosen.
item.description: Pope Francis's death at the age of 88 means the Catholic Church must choose a new leader. Here's how cardinals elect the next pontiff at the conclave.

item.description: Putin declares three-day ceasefire in Ukraine starting May 8; President Trump sends election day message to Canadians

item.title: Vehicle smashes through Illinois building, killing 4 young people and injuring others
